introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal data of users who interact with our octo-tree product. By using our services, you agree to the terms described in this policy.

imageData.title: 2.1 Image Data
imageData.content: We collect and process images submitted for analysis, such as those of solar panels or soil conditions. These images are retained for a period of 30 days to allow for necessary analysis and processing. After this period, the images and related data will be permanently deleted from our systems.

sensorData.title: 2.2 Sensor Data
sensorData.content: We collect and store data provided by the sensors integrated with octo-tree, including but not limited to humidity and temperature readings. This data is essential for the features of our soil analysis and panel analysis information systems, enabling accurate assessments and recommendations.

userData.title: 2.3 User Data
userData.content: When you register for our services, we collect personal information, including the product ID, email address, and password. This data is used for account management and to provide you with access to our services.

passwordProtection.title: 3.1 Password Protection
passwordProtection.content: Passwords provided during registration are hashed using industry-standard encryption methods. These hashed passwords are stored in secure environments to prevent unauthorized access.

communicationSecurity.title: 3.2 Communication Security
communicationSecurity.content: All communications between the client, server, and IoT devices are encrypted using strong encryption protocols. This ensures that data transmitted between your devices and our servers is secure and protected from unauthorized access.

dataRetentionDeletion.title: 4. Data Retention and Deletion
dataRetentionDeletion.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide you with our services. However, you have the right to request the deletion of your account and all associated data at any time.

requestingAccountDeletion.title: 4.1 Requesting Account Deletion
requestingAccountDeletion.content: If you wish to delete your account and all related data, please contact us at [Insert Contact Information]. We will process your request promptly, and all your data will be permanently deleted from our systems.

changesToPolicy.title: 5. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contactUs.title: 6. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at asterki.tech/contact

routines.name: Name
routines.noConditions: If no conditions are set, the routine will execute every check interval.
routines.multipleConditions: If more than one condition is set, the routine will execute if any of the conditions are met.
routines.checkIntervalRecommendation: It is recommended to have at least 30 minutes per check interval.
routines.notifyDescription: You will be notified if the routine is executed.
